rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with en-suite bathroom and individual balcony oriented towards the east for positive energy according to Vastu.
Bedroom featuring a private balcony facing north, ensuring peaceful surroundings. Includes built-in storage solutions.
Luxurious bedroom with ample natural light and east-facing balcony promoting creativity and positive energy.
Cozy yet elegant master suite with south-facing balcony for balance and relaxation. En-suite bathroom with eco-friendly fixtures.
Open-plan living area with dining space, designed to maximize natural light from large east-facing windows. Features energy-efficient lighting and sustainable materials.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with the living-dining area. Equipped with eco-friendly appliances and energy-saving LED lights.
Guest bathroom designed for efficiency using sustainable fixtures and natural light.
